pages.text: Kobolds are pesky, rat-like creatures often found in groups, wandering the halls of Labyrinths and other dark places. Their weak attacks are no match for an experienced foe, but in a group they could quickly overrun an amateur. Strangely, they may also appear when an adventurer is lost or unsure of their next path to take, and come bearing a helpful guide. Perhaps, deep down, it is still in their forgotten spiritual nature to help...
